/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A large billboard adorns the side of a building, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise traditional setting. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a bustling city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
